QuestData.Title: A Fruitful Proposition
QuestData.Description: The head of just ONE ogre won't be enough to stop the fruit vendor. No, the fruit vendor is wise, they would not put all of their fruit into one basket.$B$BBring me the head of ANOTHER ogre! Ha! Then what will the fruit vendor do? Cry onto their bananas as they rot and fall to the ground.$B$BDESPAIR, FRUIT VENDOR. SO DELICIOUS!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect a Giant Ogre Head from the Bloodmaul Slag Mines.
